extension.description: Stores cached data in sqlite3.Blobs. Calculates lifetime, freshness as virtual columns. Obeys cache control directives, immutable, no-store, etc. Supports etag, last_modified, etc for validation. Can be used as a generic key/blob data store when used without directives
